content: modern crochet baby blanket with squishiness and texture use the granny spike stitch in a 2-row repeat to create this beautiful cot size blanket or make any size you require fast and easy crochet pattern **materials** deramores studio aran 100% anti-pilling acrylic 100g/165m 2 balls of poppy 70606 i ball each of punch 70603 marigold 70636 cinnamon 70621 fern 70638 jasmin 70601 6mm and 5mm crochet hook yarn needle **measurements** 32 x 44 inches 82 x 112cm
